org.apache.jackrabbit.core.session
Class SessionContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.core.session.SessionContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
NamePathResolver, NameResolver, PathResolver
public class SessionContext
extends Object
implements NamePathResolver

Component context of a session. This class keeps track of the internal components associated with a session.

Constructor Summary
SessionContext(RepositoryContext repositoryContext, SessionImpl session, WorkspaceConfig workspaceConfig)
          Creates a component context for the given session.

Returns the qualified JCR name String for the given Name object.

getJCRName in interface NameResolver
Parameters:

NamespaceException - if the namespace URI can not be resolved
